ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Security review protocol for LLM apps handling sensitive data with explicit gates and rollback.

bullets.item: Threat modeling coverage with red-team test cases.
Redaction, access control, and audit logs enforced.
Staged rollout with rollback on failed gates.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Define prompt-injection and exfiltration tests as mandatory gates.
Apply redaction + role-based access + immutable audit logs.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Require rollback and incident response playbook on failed gates.
